table.name: sp_templates
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `sp_templates` ( `templateid` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `module` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `template` mediumtext, `header_size` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `footer_size` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `page_orientation` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `spcompany` varchar(200) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'All', PRIMARY KEY (`templateid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
